statements: SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, username, address FROM user_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT phone_number, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username;

SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) FROM devices GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Phone';
SELECT log_id, log_data FROM data_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;

SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE user_id = '2222';

SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'phone%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_data FROM data_logs WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Smart Watch');

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, dl.log_data FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.id = d.user_id INNER JOIN data_logs dl ON d.device_id = dl.device_id WHERE dl.log_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC, d.device_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM data_logs WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith'));
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, device_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity') ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT device_name, room_name FROM devices JOIN rooms ON devices.user_id = rooms.user_id;
SELECT sensor_type, data FROM sensors JOIN logs ON sensors.sensor_id = logs.sensor_id;
